subtitles:
185470 188140 - Oh, God...
- Keep your shit together.
188220 191310 If you want to get them out of here.

192140 194810 - I can pop these, no problem.
- So get to it!
209040 211540 Security, we have a break-in. Get the...

220010 222840 I know who you are.
I know what you think...

222930 226760 If you don't want to get hurt,
keep your mouth shut and don't move.

226850 232100 The chimps are infected. They're highly
contagious. They've been given an inhibitor.

232190 235650 - Infected with what?
- To cure, you must first understand.

244240 247410 - What is he talking about?
- Get the cages open.

249540 253830 Listen, you sick bastard,
we're taking your torture victims with us.
253920 255500 We'll get you out of here.

255580 260250 The animals are contagious. The infection
is in their blood and saliva. One bite...
277610 279730 Get it off! Get it off!

283360 286570 - What's the matter with her?
- You have to kill her!

295250 298460 - What's the matter with her?
- We have to kill her now!

1004120 1007000 - What the fuck is going on?
- Just shut up!

1015130 1017720 - Covered everything.
- Who are those people?

1046370 1048630 - What the fuck is going on?
- Just move!

1078610 1083370 Man walks into a bar with a giraffe.
They each get pissed.

1085540 1090750 The man goes to leave and the barman says
"Oi! You can't leave that lying there."
1090840 1094880 He says "No, it's not a lion. It's a giraffe".
1105470 1108390 You two should get on like a house on fire.

1115190 1118700 - Are you a doctor?
- He's not a doctor. He's a patient.

1123280 1129710 I was riding a package from Farringdon to
Shaftesbury Avenue and a car cut across me.

1129790 1133540 Then I wake up today in hospital.
I wake up and I'm...

1159110 1165370 It started as rioting, and right from
the beginning you knew this was different.

1165450 1169620 Because it was happening
in small villages, market towns.
1170500 1173250 And then it wasn't on the TV any more.

1173330 1178050 It was in the street outside.
It was coming through your windows.
1181930 1184760 You didn't need a doctor to tell you that.
1187390 1189890 There was something in the blood.

1191350 1196320 By the time they tried to evacuate
the cities, it was already too late.
1203450 1206160 And that's when the exodus started.

1210370 1214040 there were reports of Infection
in Paris and New York.
1216420 1219340 We didn't hear anything more after that.

1222300 1225260 - What's the government doing?
- There's no government.

1227890 1231980 There's always a government.
They're in a bunker or a plane...

1232060 1236360 No, there's no government,
no police, no army.
1237820 1240900 No TV, no radio, no electricity.

1241530 1245700 You're the first uninfected person
we've seen in six days.

1264090 1268100 Look, I have to find them.
They live in Deptford. I can walk it. OK?
1268180 1270770 You'll go and come back, yeah?

1285530 1289950 You never go anywhere alone
unless you've got no choice.

1292450 1296540 Only travel during daylight.
Unless you've got no choice.

1300710 1304300 We'll all go and find
your dead parents together, OK?

1318980 1322150 If you want her to slow down,
you'll have to say.

1486520 1490480 They died peacefully.
You should be grateful.

1496950 1501450 parents and my sister,
we went to Paddington Station,

1504080 1509420 hoping maybe we could get on a plane,
maybe we could buy our way onto a plane.
1510050 1512420 I remember my dad had all this cash,
1512510 1515840 even though cash was completely useless.
1517390 1520520 About 20,000 other people had the same idea.
1526060 1528400 I lost my grip on my sister's hand.
1530570 1532900 I remember the ground was soft.

1534860 1539240 I looked down
and I was standing on all these people.
1539330 1543290 Like a carpet. People who had fallen and...

1543370 1547330 Somewhere in the crowd
there were Infected. It spread fast.

1547420 1550750 No one could run.
All you could do was climb.

1552380 1555470 Climb over more people.
So I did that. I climbed.
1555550 1557930 And I got up on top of this kiosk.

1560220 1565180 Looking down, you couldn't tell
which faces were infected and which weren't.

1565270 1569150 Then I saw my dad.
Not my mum or my sister.

1583240 1588420 We don't have time to get back to the shop
before dark. We should stay here tonight.

1591090 1593920 My room's up at the top.
You two can have that.
1594010 1597340 No, we'll all sleep in the same room. It's safer.
1700030 1702320 Give me a drink of that, will ya?
1711210 1713290 I'll start working on them, then.

1746740 1749700 - That's Mr Bridges.
- Were you bitten?
1749790 1752000 And his daughter. From four doors down.
1755250 1758170 Did any of the blood get in your mouth?
1796040 1798130 Do you have any clothes here?

1801210 1804880 Then get them and get dressed.
We have to leave now.

1804970 1808640 More Infected will be coming.
They always do.

1837420 1840420 [JIM] How did you know?
How did you know he was infected?

1840500 1844420 - The blood.
- There was blood on me. It was on you.

1844510 1849890 I didn't know he was infected.
He knew. I could see it in his face.

1849970 1854390 If someone gets infected,
you've about 20 seconds to kill them.

1854470 1859600 It might be your brother, your sister
or your oldest friend. It makes no difference.

1859690 1865110 Just so you know where you stand,
if it happens to you, I'll do it in a heartbeat.

1865190 1869410 He was full of plans.
Have you got any plans, Jim?

1869490 1873950 Do you want us to find a cure and
save the world or just fall in love and fuck?
1876620 1879210 Staying alive is as good as it gets.

1937930 1941060 What is it about tower blocks
and shopping trolleys?
1941140 1944230 Stop talking. It's a long way up.
1962170 1964250 Now I do need a break.

1984020 1989320 - Why didn't you say something before?
- I didn't think you'd give a shit.

1990530 1994780 You've got no fat on you
and all you've had to eat is sugar.
1997070 1999330 There isn't a lot we can do about that

1999410 2004500 except pump you full of painkillers
and give you more sugar. As for sugar,

2010210 2013260 Actually,
I did have a can of Tango somewhere.

2090630 2093630 - Open the fucking door!
- Where's Dad?
2093710 2096010 Let them in, Hannah. Let them inside.

2129420 2132500 - Selena.
- Selena. Good to meet you.
2147770 2150060 Calls for a celebration, I'd say.
2150140 2153190 Why don't you all sit down and...
2153270 2156230 Hannah, what have we got to offer?
2156320 2158820 We've got Mum's crème de menthe.

2169790 2172790 - [FRANK] Where are the bloody glasses?
- Middle cupboard.
2172880 2175750 Nah, the good ones. It's a celebration.
2198530 2201610 I know it isn't much but, well, cheers.

2230430 2236020 Sorry we couldn't spare the water.
Same with the toilet. The flush doesn't work.
2237690 2239940 You'll have to use the bucket.
2246490 2249120 Have to empty it each morning.

2249200 2252870 Just chuck it over the balcony.
No mod cons here.
2254750 2257880 Listen, it's late. We're going to turn in.
2271220 2273600 I'll take the living room. It's fine.

2310300 2314020 - So what do you make of them?
- Well, they're desperate.
2315140 2317980 Probably need us more than we need them.

2329280 2333950 You should be more concerned about
whether they're going to slow you down.

2334040 2337790 - Because if they slowed you down...
- I'd leave them behind.

2342250 2345800 Then you're going to wind up
getting yourself killed.
2354140 2356640 I'm going to get some sleep.
2361860 2365110 You think I don't get it, but I do get it.

2366990 2370990 And I know I'd be dead already
if I hadn't met you.
2403190 2405270 We lost water pressure three weeks ago.

2405360 2409490 I thought we'd be OK with the water
from the other flats. Cisterns and tanks.

2409570 2412780 But it vanishes so quick
you wouldn't believe.

2429260 2433510 You can set up a plastic sheet
to catch dew and condensation.
2433590 2437350 Saw it on TV once, but I can't make it work.
2453410 2456530 Jim, we're not going to be able to stay here.

2465460 2469210 - There's been no broadcasts for weeks.
- Just listen.

2469300 2473890 [Man On Radio] Salvation is here.
The answer to Infection is here.
2473970 2476970 If you can hear this, you're not alone.

2477050 2481560 There are others like you.
There are other survivors.
2481640 2483850 We are soldiers and we are armed.

2487320 2491900 - Quiet. There's more.
- Our location is the 42nd blockade, M602,

2495490 2499410 - You must find us. Salvation is...
- Now it just repeats.

2499490 2501870 - It's a recording?
- Yeah, it's a recording.
2501950 2504870 But this is where it's telling us to go.

2508630 2513420 The way things are, we might need
two or three days to get up there.

2519310 2525390 Sound carries in this flat. Me and Hannah
do need you more than you need us.

2525480 2528650 - Look, I didn't...
- No, it's OK. It's the truth.
2528730 2531230 I can't leave the block if it's the two of us.

2531320 2535280 Something might happen to me.
Hannah would be alone. I couldn't risk it.

2537160 2541450 If it's a recording,
the soldiers who made it could be dead.

2541540 2545040 - It's possible.
- That stuff about the answer to Infection...

2545120 2549420 There is no answer!
It's already done all the damage it can!

2549500 2552340 - Maybe they have a cure.
- Maybe they've got nothing.

2552420 2556510 - The only way to find out is to reach them.
- We could die trying, Frank!

2560970 2566690 And anyway, it isn't true what Dad said.
You need us just the same as we need you.

2570150 2575440 And we'll never be safe in the cities.
The soldiers could keep us safe.
2576150 2578240 So we have to try and get there.

2592380 2596130 Just so you know,
I don't take cheques or credit cards.

2624700 2627710 - [FRANK] What do you think?
- It's the most direct route.

2627790 2633040 Then we should take the indirect route.
The one in daylight and not underground.
2650650 2653150 No. See, this is a really shit idea.

2654020 2657400 You know why?
Because it's obviously a shit idea.

2657490 2661860 So we're going to drive into the tunnel
full of fucking smashed cars...
2661950 2664870 It's really fucking obviously a shit idea!
2700530 2702950 The world's worst place to get a flat.
2703030 2706370 Agreed. I think we'd better do this quick.
2708870 2711040 I've got the wheel. You're on the jack.

2725640 2729180 Do you hear that?
Hey, hey, do you hear that?

2761170 2765470 Forget the jack, Hannah.
There's no time. Just lift, everyone.
2765550 2768800 Grab hold! One, two, three, lift!

2775270 2780400 - [SELENA] Don't look at them! Don't look!
- [JIM] I can see them! They're coming!

2791290 2794210 - Get the tyre on, Hannah!
- I'm trying.

2807590 2810050 - Get in the car!
- Come on!

2886550 2890130 Don't take anything
that needs to be cooked, OK?
2890220 2892050 I think you can eat that raw.

2899730 2904230 If I never see another chocolate bar again,
it'll be too soon.

2908950 2912570 Now, single malt,
16-year-old, dark, full flavour.
2920670 2923920 Takes out the fire but leaves in the warmth.
2978810 2981890 Either we do this now or we're walking.

3034110 3036780 [Quietly] Like going on holidays
with your aunt!

3134920 3137720 - Find anything, Jim?
- No! Let's get outta here.
3213670 3216670 I can, like, taste the vitamin C.
3217500 3220300 Mmmm, the raisins are so moist.

3281610 3285320 That you'll never hear
another piece of original music again.

3285400 3289580 You'll never read a book
that hasn't already been written,
3290620 3294460 or see a film that hasn't already been shot.
3298960 3302210 Um... that's what you were thinking.
3305420 3307720 I was thinking I was wrong.

3319150 3323650 It doesn't really mean anything
to Frank and Hannah because...

3325030 3328490 Well, she's got her dad
and he's got his daughter. So...

3331160 3334790 I was wrong when I said
staying alive is as good as it gets.
3338420 3340920 See, that's what I was thinking.

3358690 3362690 It's getting late.
We'd better stay here for the night.
3391010 3393680 Selena didn't seem to have any trouble.
3401980 3404020 How would you get to sleep?

3410490 3414370 Bloody hell. Must have needed
a hell of a prescription for that lot.

3414450 3418750 I didn't need a prescription.
I qualified as a chemist.
3421460 3424040 Not only will we be able to get to sleep

3424130 3427840 but if we're attacked in the middle
of the night, we won't even care.

3427920 3430170 - Two each.
- Not for me, thanks.
3442650 3445360 Come on, Frank. Let her live a little.

3446440 3450440 - Give her half of one.
- All right. We're on.
3527360 3530150 You're having a bad dream, that's all.

3585450 3588960 - Did I miss breakfast?
- [SELENA] You'll sleep through anything.

3589040 3594050 - [JIM] Did you have a fry-up?
- [FRANK] We'll stop at a pub on the way. Door!

3618610 3623120 [Radio] Our location
is the 42nd blockade, the M602,
3630580 3633630 The answer to Infection is here.
3669960 3673330 The whole of Manchester, the whole city.
3675170 3677510 No fire crews to put it out.

3808470 3812470 I don't understand, Dad.
Did they leave?

3812560 3815690 - I don't like this. I think we should go.
- No!

3822530 3827360 Vehicles. We should check the vehicles.
There has to be something.

3943770 3946690 - Dad?
- Keep away from me! Keep away from me!
3946770 3949280 Keep away! Keep away! Keep away!
4012510 4015180 [MAN] Three survivors. One male, two female.
4015260 4018600 I repeat, one male, two female.

4083410 4088290 Well, we've got beds with clean sheets
and a boiler that produces hot water.
4088370 4090790 So you can all have a shower.
4090880 4094210 You look like you need one. Please.

4114150 4119360 It isn't funny. I got loads of cooking to do,
you fucking Doris!
4128160 4131330 She's lost her dad, Jim. That's how she is.

4143640 4147230 Oh, don't do that.
Come on, come on, come on.

4151060 4156070 Hannah is what Frank says she is. Tough,
strong, and she'll cope just like I'll cope.

4156150 4160070 - Just like you'll cope.
- I don't want her to have to fucking cope.
4161360 4163780 I want her to be OK.
4165370 4167540 When Hannah had her dad it was OK.
4167620 4170410 It was OK for them and it was OK for us.

4210540 4214040 - Yeah, we did.
- We must be a disappointment.

4214130 4220260 You were hoping for a full brigade. An army
base with helicopters and a field hospital.

4222680 4226850 - We were just hoping for...
- The answer to Infection.

4231350 4235860 As I said before, it's here. Though
it may not be quite what you imagined.

4236230 4239150 - Just feel lucky to have found you.
- You were lucky.

4239230 4242360 The fire drove hundreds of Infected
out of Manchester.
4242450 4245530 The surrounding area's teeming with them.

4255580 4261460 Flat terrain all round the house. Floodlights
which we've rigged up to a generator.

4265180 4269430 And we've been lacing the ground
with tripwires and land mines.

4269510 4274190 You wouldn't want to mow the lawn,
but if they get in, we hear them.

4277440 4282360 Secondary to protection,
our real job is to rebuild. Start again.
4282440 4284860 The belly of the house. The heart.

4284950 4290200 A wood-fired boiler providing us with hot
water. The first step towards civilisation.
4292450 4294580 Here you are. I'll swap you.

4294660 4297880 - Now don't be throwing it.
- Here, give us some.

4297960 4302000 Don't be fighting.
Will you put that back? Put it back.

4304550 4307550 - What are you cooking, Jones?
- Surprise, sir.

4331950 4337040 Mitchell managed to knock him out cold
and we got a chain round his neck.

4344710 4348760 The idea was to learn something
about Infection.
4371450 4374870 He's telling me he'll never bake bread.

4386510 4391890 And eventually he'll tell me how long
the Infected take to starve to death.
4431630 4434100 [  You'll have to wait and see  ]
4436510 4439100 [  We hope it's chips, it's chips  ]
4455490 4458870 Tinned ham, tinned peas, tinned beans and...

4466460 4468920 - It's a feast, Jones.
- Honour of our guests.
4469010 4472220 Absolutely. I was going to propose a toast
4472300 4475430 but this omelette will do just as well.

4490990 4494910 Jones, did you notice while cooking
that these eggs were off?
4494990 4498410 I thought the salt might cover the taste, sir.
4505370 4508170 I don't suppose you can cook, can you?

4509000 4514470 I can't tell you how badly we need
someone with a little flair in the kitchen.

4514550 4519100 What a fucking disappointment.
I saw those eggs, I thought it was Christmas.

4519180 4522430 We'll have eggs again.
Once everything is back to normal.
4522520 4525350 You muppet! Look at him, eh?

4525440 4529480 He's still waiting
for Marks and Spencer's to reopen.

4529570 4533900 - You don't know nothing.
- I think Bill's got a point.
4533990 4537110 If you look at the whole life of the planet,

4539200 4543330 you know, Man has only been around
for a few blinks of an eye.
4544080 4546540 So if the infection wipes us all out,
4547540 4549840 that is a return to normality.

4553840 4556840 - That what you meant, Bill?
- Yeah, yeah.
4556930 4560180 Have you met our New Age sergeant?

4563060 4568270 Tell me, Farrell, exactly why
did you join the army in the first place?

4571070 4575190 This is what I've seen
in the four weeks since Infection.

4577990 4582540 Which is what I saw in the four weeks before
Infection, the four weeks before that...

4582620 4588080 As far back as I care to remember,
people killing people.

4588170 4591790 Which to my mind
puts us in a state of normality now.

4600090 4603060 - You're not eating?
- I don't want to eat.

4606020 4609270 I don't want to eat.
I want to bury my dad.
4610190 4613320 He's one of the people you're talking about.
4617400 4619450 Let's go, let's go, let's go!

4671250 4674880 What do you want, a fucking sweetie?
Keep shooting, you cunt!
4691560 4693860 I have never seen that in my life!

4716500 4722130 Listen, sweetheart, you aren't
going to be needing this any more.
4722220 4724430 Cos you got me to protect you now.

4726220 4731520 You want to get your hands on a really
big chopper, you just come and see me.

4733140 4735310 - That's an offer, Mitch.
- Give her some.

4741530 4746030 Easy, tiger. You don't want to go
picking a fight with me, son.

4753750 4756790 - Mitchell, first action on.
- Resecure the perimeter.
4756880 4760340 Then get to it. Jones, Bedford, go with him.
4770810 4773520 Clear the bodies off the lawn.
4776400 4778980 The rest of you, go with him.

4801380 4805590 We're very grateful for your protection
but if we're going to stay here...

4805680 4807220 - Who have you killed?
- No one.

4807300 4812470 Who have you killed? You wouldn't be alive
now if you hadn't killed somebody.
4819730 4822860 I killed... I killed a boy.

4834500 4839290 But you had to.
Otherwise he'd have killed you.

4860270 4864070 Eight days ago I found Jones
with his gun in his mouth.

4865230 4869950 He said he was going to kill himself
because there was no future.
4870030 4872910 What could I say to him?

4872990 4878210 We fight off the Infected or we wait
until they starve to death and then what?

4879120 4882960 What do nine men do
except wait to die themselves?

4883040 4889180 I moved us from the blockade, I set the radio
broadcasting and I promised them women.

4906730 4908530 - What is it?
- We have to go.

4908610 4910700 - Jim, wait!
- No time! Come on!
4916830 4918790 We get in the car and we go!

4920160 4924710 No! You're not going to keep them here!
You've got to let them go!

4924790 4928050 You can't keep them here!
Stay where you are!
4928130 4930840 I'm not going to let you keep them here!
4944770 4947110 I want to give you a chance.
4950950 4953240 But I can't let them go.

4981310 4984060 [FARRELL] Smithers says
"Women and semen don't mix."

4984150 4987060 And Mr Burns says
"We all know what you think, Smithers."

4987150 4990070 And that was my favourite joke
in The Simpsons.

4990150 4993780 That's what they're doing a few
hundred miles away, across the Channel,

4993860 4998280 across the Atlantic. Eating dinner
and watching the fucking Simpsons!

4998370 5001660 They're sleeping in their beds
next to their wives.

5001750 5007460 But we're here chained to a fucking radiator
because the OC has gone insane!

5008500 5012550 Starting the world again when the rest
of the world hasn't even stopped.
5013930 5017050 Just imagine, just think about it.
5018100 5020390 How could Infection cross the oceans?

5020470 5024770 How could it cross the mountains
and the rivers? It can be stopped.

5024850 5027560 Right now TVs are playing
and planes are flying

5027650 5031650 and the rest of the world
is continuing as fucking normal.

5035950 5039530 What would you do
with a diseased little island?

5048290 5052670 "There is no Infection.
It's just people killing people." He's insane!

5099220 5102350 - Please...
- Believe me, I'm not interested.

5103430 5108560 You see, I'm going to have the black one.
And I'm going to make her squirm.

5108640 5112570 Mitchell, I swear to God
it's going to end badly for you.
5116400 5118490 Get up, you cunt! Fucking move!

5143470 5146890 [FARRELL] Come on then,
you fucking pansies. Do me first.

5146970 5149480 [JONES]
No, Mitch. Mitch, just use the gat.

5149560 5152610 - [FARRELL] So you're going to stick me?
- [JONES] Shoot them!

5155440 5158490 [FARRELL] Is that how you'd let
your sergeant go out, Jones?

5158570 5160490 - I'll shoot them!
- No, you won't.

5160570 5164030 You'll let him stick me?
Like a fucking dog?

5173330 5177300 You stupid cunt! What are you doing?
You want to shoot me?

5177380 5181550 - You want to shoot me? I'll kill you!
- Where's he fucking gone?
5182800 5185640 Fuck it! Get up! Get after him!

5188140 5191350 - Jones, move it!
- I can see him! I can see him!

5201110 5203030 - Can you see him?
- Through there!
5218500 5221970 He's over the wall. He's got no vehicle.

5261010 5264970 [WEST] The first thing we're going to do
is make you look more presentable.

5265050 5268640 The lady of the house
has an extensive wardrobe
5268720 5271270 which she certainly has no use for.
5272270 5274100 You can't do it to Hannah.

5274190 5277900 Go to the master bedroom,
pick out a wide selection.

5291410 5294210 - It's only dressing up!
- No! Selena!

5294290 5297630 - I thought girls liked dressing up.
- Expensive dresses.

5316390 5320520 You need to leave me alone
with Hannah. OK?

5322400 5326110 - Listen, right. The OC wants...
- He wants us to dress up nice.

5326200 5330370 If you want us to get changed,
you have to leave the room. OK?
5354140 5357020 Come on, lads. Let's leave the room.

5380080 5384050 We're going to eat these, Hannah, OK?
Come on. Eat these.
5384130 5386300 Are you trying to kill me?
5388720 5391260 I'm making you not care. OK?

5399350 5401850 - Someone is at the blockade!
- Jim!
5403230 5405900 Stay here and put the dresses on.

5411740 5414330 He went over the wall.
We thought he'd be dead.
5644390 5646850 It sounded like a Claymore to me.

5647890 5651850 All right, I'll go and hit the floods,
take a butcher's.
5654610 5657240 keep an eye on him, will ya?
5670410 5672920 I think they're having an effect.

5688470 5691350 What are you going to do
if they don't come back?
5692100 5695190 Would you be the officer if Henry was dead?
5695270 5697280 Is that the way it works?

5700820 5704910 I don't think they are coming back.
I think they've been killed.
5712290 5714790 And you're going to be next.

5723840 5726970 We're going to get out of here.
Stay with it, Hannah.
5727050 5729890 Don't worry. I feel fine. Really.

5751950 5757500 Oi! Where the fuck are you going?
What's all the fucking shouting about?

5765470 5768850 Don't just stand there,
you soppy cunt! Get after them!
5791290 5794250 What the fuck you going to do now?

5820820 5824570 - Defend these stairs with your fucking life!
- Hannah!

6003290 6007670 I haven't got any bullets.
I haven't got any fucking bullets!

6071070 6075860 It's just you and me now, darling.
But don't worry, I'll get you out of here.

6075950 6080410 Then we'll find a nice little fucking place
somewhere. Just you and me.
6080490 6082830 And we'll live happy ever after, eh?
6147180 6149690 That was longer than a heartbeat.
6163950 6167500 Listen. Listen. It's not all fucked.
6173250 6175750 We're going to be OK. It's not all fucked.
